list_of_major_updates: New PDK Loading system
New Loading Screens
Direction Keys in Character Select Menu
New Character Skin System
New BG Destruction Transition Mechanic
BATTLE MODE HAS BEEN FIXED AND IS NOW AVAILABLE!
Defense Multipliers in Battle Mode allow for balanced battles
New Scouters System: Bonus combat speed and damage for basic attacks
New Frieza Warriors Stages! (Levels 1-3)
New WIDESCREEN and FULLSCREEN
Updated Backgrounds
New Character HUD frames and bars scouter design
Completely Revamped Character Select Menu
Updated Face pics with new radar chart stats
New air recovery
Revamped Ki system: New ki regeneration system and ki charge speeds
Characters with negative ki regeneration will go back to base form after all ki is depleted
BRAND NEW TRAINING MODE!

character_changes: SS Trunks (Armour)(Android): Removed Aerial Super Rapid Punches
SS Trunks (Armour)(Android): Nerfed Super Rapid Punches
SS Trunks (Armour)(Android): Nerfed Heat Dome Attack
Ultra Trunks (Armour)(Android): Attack Speed and Damage Buffs
Majin Vegeta (Buu): Faster Big Bang Attack
Majin Vegeta (Buu): Final Explosion Complete Revamp
Super Vegito (Buu): Final Kamhehameha Complete Revamp

list_of_major_updates: Faster loading times
New Ki Charge System: NO MORE CARPAL TUNNEL! Charge Ki by holding A to charge rather than spamming A button (DJA A Hold A)
New Battle Damage System: When character HP drops a certain amount their clothes get damaged! (Currently only on all forms of Goku (Buu))
New System return to base form after being KOed! (Visual only and currently only on all forms of Goku (Buu))

sprite_changes: Updated Charging Ki visuals with new lighting and shading on some characters (Super Saiyans)
character_changes: SS Vegeta (Buu) - Decreased Ki Usage from 125% to 105%

backgrounds: [+] Added NEW BG: Time Chamber / ROSAT
list_of_major_updates: Krillin Major Overhaul, Details: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SQLIcWp_s2w
Modified EXE art

sprite_changes: Electric sparks are a new colour
The bottom of Goku’s shoes are now red like how they should be
new_moves: [+] TEAM ATTACK: Final Kamehameha (SS Goku and SS Vegeta)
speed_adjustments: [-] SS Vegeta (Buu)’s Final Burst Cannon: 6 TU

list_of_major_updates: New Face pics: now using anime pictures and shows level, attack and defense indicator
Re-added ads to EXE but they are all related to the DBZ LF2 links and less visually obtrusive
Modified EXE art

character_changes: Vegeta (Namek) - Broke down Dirty Fireworks into D^A A (allows for new combos)
Vegeta (Namek) - Broke down Genocide Breaker into D^J A (in case kick is blocked no need to fly attacking nothing)
Vegeta (Namek) - Final Crash has been sped up significantly
Vegeta (Namek) - Final Burst Canon has been sped up a bit
list_of_minor_updates: Common melee attacks now use state 7 in the itr frames. So basically while you are attacking you are also defending to create a small type of “clash”
AI improvements to all characters, mostly on CRAZY! Mode only though
Goku and Vegeta can now fuse into Vegito using potara earrings, 50% chance Goku takes control and 50% Vegeta takes control, +500 health

list_of_major_updates: Modified EXE art

list_of_minor_updates: Changed Hunter’s arrow to a level 1 ki blast
Changed Ice (frozen) effect to blind effect (still in beta as you become temporarily invincible)

Instant Transmission now teleports you to opposite side of where it usually puts you. (So if you and your opponent are facing each other, instead of continuing to face them, you will teleport behind them)
Created a shitty recolour of the Cliff background to try and make my own wastelands hah
Decreased the size of Super Vegito’s Kamehameha ball by 25%
Added sound effect when you deflect a ki blast
SS Vegeta (Android), Super Vegeta(Android) and SS2 Vegeta (Buu) use Big Bang Attack a bit faster with new voice clip!
minor speed increase on Majin Vegeta’s Final Impact and it no longer disappears after a second (unless of course it’s destroyed)

list_of_major_updates: Compressed some of the BMP files making the extracted game much smaller (side effect includes some loss of quality in SOME of the sprites, but is hardly noticeable at all, especially in the heat of battle)
Modified EXE art
Modified SS Vegeta (Buu)’s Hellzone Grenade (originally shot 6 ground balls, now shoots 7 ground and 3 sky)
Re-applied combos to the Vegeta (Buu) characters

list_of_minor_updates: Fixed Vegito and Super Vegito’s Explosive wave hitboxes and adjusted damage.
Added random “spectactor” in so you can watch the AI battle it out in VS mode
Re-added Bandit and Hunter so there is like a “stage” mode kind of (except their health is same so really easy to kill with higher level chars)
Added my old Krillin character for some more variety. Haven’t edited the character but added some AI and 1.2 armor defense

list_of_major_updates: Each character has AI at all 4 different difficulty settings
